title: VV的BlueFriends插件链接数据库出错！
author: xiongxin
txt_content:
它显示
ERROR>用于连接数据库的用户名或密码错误,请检查你的配置
ERROR>插件即将自动卸载
我检查了好几遍都没错啊！
这里是错误日志

Communications link failure

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
那数据库
本身是否启动或者炸了呢(

replies.author: xiongxin
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-12 10:42
那数据库
本身是否启动或者炸了呢(
 Mon Aug 12 10:48:28 CST 2019 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.
这个怎么搞

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
xiongxin 发表于 2019-8-12 10:50
Mon Aug 12 10:48:28 CST 2019 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verifica ...
useSSL=true
mysql链接加这个参数

replies.author: xiongxin
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-12 10:51
useSSL=true
mysql链接加这个参数
在哪加，Connections的那个%那里加吗

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
xiongxin 发表于 2019-8-12 10:52
在哪加，Connections的那个%那里加吗
我不太清楚
&useSSL=true
结尾加这个应该可以
